lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: What two miracles did Peter do?
answers: He healed Aeneas’ legs and raised Tabitha from the dead
He fed 5,000 people and walked on water
He parted the Red Sea and called down fire
He drove out demons and calmed a storm

questions.text: When the people saw the miracles, what did they do?
What did Herod do to James and Peter?
answers: He killed James with a sword and put Peter in prison
He forced them to leave Jerusalem

questions.text: What did the church do while Peter was in prison?
answers: They tried to break him out of prison

questions.text: Who did God send to rescue Peter from prison?
What happened when the angel rescued Peter?
answers: His chains fell off, the doors opened, and the guards stayed asleep

questions.text: What did Peter think was happening as he escaped?
answers: He thought it was a trick
He thought the guards were joking

questions.text: Why didn’t Rhoda let Peter inside the house?
answers: She was so excited that she forgot to open the door
She was afraid of the guards
She thought it was too late at night

questions.text: What did the church think when Rhoda told them Peter was there?
answers: You are out of your mind! It must be Peter’s angel
Let him in right away, silly girl!

questions.text: What did Peter tell them after he came inside?
answers: How the Lord sent an angel to rescue him from prison
How he escaped by his own strength
How he planned to leave town forever
